name: Friction Control
description:
Friction Control is a Puzzle/Casual 2D game. 

I worked on this old prototype for one month on the second year of my game design studies. I was the only one who work on this project and my goal was to create something playable, with a bit of polish inside. 

All the code is made with Playmaker, and for the visuals i used Adobe Xd. 

If you have advice or anything else, leave a comment, Ty :)

Game Control:

Hold Mouse Left - Speeding Paint

Hold Mouse Right - Slowing Paint

D Key - Use Clearing Tool

Space Bar - Drop the Ball

R key - Reset
